backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in-memory storage for profiles, tasks, overtime, decisions, and dental avatars within the main Motoko canister actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping UI changes to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and pages for reference.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines extensive OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx with a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls authentication flow using Internet Identity and renders either loading, login, or the authenticated app UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Determines post-login routing based on user role and profile state, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Empty placeholder file for a first‑manager confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen allowing assistants or managers to select a role, optionally enter a manager token, and proceed with Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: UI for selecting assistant or manager role with optional manager token and persisted pending selections.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty placeholder file for avatar manifest.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Displays selectable dental avatars with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Renders an SVG dental avatar or a fallback if missing/invalid, using data URIs and error handling.
frontend/src/components/avatars/Generate: Generates a pastel-colored SVG avatar showing initials with a tooth motif.
frontend/src/components/avatars/ProfileA: Chooses between uploaded photo, dental avatar, or generated initials avatar for user display.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines static badge metadata including IDs, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Shows all badges in a sheet, marking earned ones and supporting translations.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Full‑screen error fallback with message, details, and retry button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top app header with logo, theme/language controls, profile menu, settings, badges, and logout.
Main layout container with header, tab navigation, routed pages, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown to switch between supported UI languages.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button to toggle between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table of completed tasks with user info, comments, and before/after photos.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Generates a bar chart showing how many tasks each user has completed.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Renders a user dropdown selector with avatars and triggers selection changes.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Simple horizontal tab navigation component highlighting the active tab.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Custom date input field combining manual inputs with a hidden native date picker enforcing a 2‑month range.
Form for adding or deducting overtime minutes with validation and submission to backend.
Shows a sorted list of overtime entries, color‑coded based on addition or deduction.
Calculates and displays total overtime in minutes and formatted days/hours/minutes.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Privacy settings panel allowing data export, logout, and local data deletion.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for initial profile setup allowing username, initials, avatar selection, and optional photo upload, then saving via profile API hooks.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Component for selecting, previewing, validating, and removing a profile photo with optional upload progress display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Profile settings sheet enabling editing of username, initials, avatar or photo, with upload/remove photo logic and privacy panel access.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for marking a task complete with comment and optional before/after photos uploaded as blobs.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating a new task with title, description, and type selection, then submitting via task creation API.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Task card displaying task details, completion status, and actions to complete or reset the task, with dynamic styling by type.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Renders a sorted list of tasks, placing completed tasks last and ordering by task type priority, with fallback UI when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges based on overtime entries and completed tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches dental avatars from the backend and offers a lookup helper by avatar ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context for translations and ensures usage within the provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Fetches overtime entries for a specific user and provides a helper to format entries for export.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Exposes a query to export all task data from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Wraps toast notifications and normalizes common backend error messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Handles fetching and creating caller overtime entries with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that feature-specific hooks live elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Allows selecting assistant or manager roles and updates related authorization queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Provides task CRUD operations with optimistic updates and special handling for obsolete weekly tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and mutates user profile data, including photos, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides a React context for language selection and translation lookup with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and a nested translations object for UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, color variables, dark mode values, and adds a float animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Renders manager dashboard with tab navigation for overtime management and task statistics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Allows managers to view a user's overtime data, export CSV, and browse totals and history.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Shows task statistics and audit logs and allows exporting task data to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history, loading entries and showing a spinner when needed.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows tasks with create dialog and resets recurring tasks when due, handling loading and user profile checks.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports an array of objects to a CSV file with proper escaping and file download handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color palette using CSS variables, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current feature requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the FitGebit Team Tracker app, including authentication, roles, avatars, tasks, and overtime logic.
